description:
A US District Court has delivered a verdict in a major antitrust case, finding Google liable for monopolising key segments of the digital advertising technology (ad tech) market. The ruling, following a three-week bench trial, concluded that Google unlawfully acquired and maintained monopoly power in the markets for publisher ad servers and ad exchanges for... Read more »

The post Google found guilty of ad tech monopoly in antitrust case appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Google found guilty of ad tech monopoly in antitrust case
